name: Right-Angle Ruckus
description:
Right-Angle Ruckus is a shoot to survive distraction. This is a game designed to pass the time and was made in 7 days.

Potential Future Additions:

-  Local multiplayer

-  Randomly generated maps

- Minibosses

Controls:

Move: WAD / Arrow Keys

Shoot: F / Left Mouse

Pause: Escape
